content.text: Match ends, Southampton 1, Watford 0.
Second Half ends, Southampton 1, Watford 0.
Attempt missed. Christian Kabasele (Watford) header from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by José Holebas with a cross.
Foul by Maya Yoshida (Southampton).
Stefano Okaka (Watford) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jérémy Pied (Southampton).
Abdoulaye Doucouré (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Jérémy Pied (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jerome Sinclair (Watford).
Foul by Ben Watson (Watford).
Pierre-Emile Højbjerg (Southampton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Stefano Okaka (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Roberto Pereyra with a cross.
Jerome Sinclair (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Shane Long (Southampton).
Attempt blocked. Richarlison (Watford) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Substitution, Southampton. Guido Carrillo replaces Dusan Tadic.
Christian Kabasele (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Shane Long (Southampton).
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Jack Stephens.

Substitution, Watford. Jerome Sinclair replaces Daryl Janmaat.

Foul by Abdoulaye Doucouré (Watford).
Oriol Romeu (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Cédric Soares (Southampton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Substitution, Watford. Roberto Pereyra replaces André Carrillo.
Attempt saved. Sofiane Boufal (Southampton) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Oriol Romeu.
Attempt blocked. Daryl Janmaat (Watford) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ben Watson.

Substitution, Watford. Stefano Okaka replaces Etienne Capoue.
Second Half begins Southampton 1, Watford 0.
First Half ends, Southampton 1, Watford 0.
Attempt saved. José Holebas (Watford) header from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Richarlison with a cross.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Alex McCarthy.
Attempt missed. Cédric Soares (Southampton) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Dusan Tadic.
